meaningMnemonic:
Something or someone <kanji>resident</kanji> in 日本 (Japan) is <vocabulary>stationed in Japan</vocabulary>.

駐日 is generally used to describe both individuals and institutions stationed in Japan for official duties, such as the 駐日大使 (Ambassador to Japan) or 駐日大使館 (embassy stationed in Japan).
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
